h1_title: King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince
h2_title: King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince Mini-Boss Fight and Guide
content: When the battle begins, you’ll notice that the King wisely does not try to fight you up close. He’ll scurry behind his son and out of sight while the Second Rat Prince tries to hold your attention with massive swings from his spiked mace. The King can even burrow underground, creating a trail of flying dirt as he tries to evade you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'King_of_Flowing_Sands_and_Second_Rat_Prince.md', within the main section titled 'King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince', specifically from the subsection 'King of Flowing Sands and Second Rat Prince Mini-Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
When the battle begins, you’ll notice that the King wisely does not try to fight you up close. He’ll scurry behind his son and out of sight while the Second Rat Prince tries to hold your attention with massive swings from his spiked mace. The King can even burrow underground, creating a trail of flying dirt as he tries to evade you.
